note: This data is measured in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices to account for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
title: GNI per capita vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: [Gross national income](#dod:gni) (GNI) measures the total income earned by residents of a country, including income earned abroad. [Gross domestic product](#dod:gdp) (GDP) instead counts only income generated from goods and services produced domestically.
